name: pawscript-wasm
description: PawScript WASM bindings for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.build:wasm: cd ../src && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o pawscript.wasm ./wasm/main.go || GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o pawscript.wasm ./wasm/main.go
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -f pawscript.wasm dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && (cp -f wasm_exec.js dist/wasm_exec.js 2>/dev/null || cp -f src/wasm_exec_loader.js dist/wasm_exec_loader.js 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -f index.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || cp -f src/index.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:assets
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test:browser: npm run build && npm run serve
